DOC.criteria: Provision sign informed consent Clinically normal physical finding , laboratory value , vital sign rest ECG judge investigator History clinically significant cardio cerebrovascular , pulmonary , renal , hepatic , neurological , mental gastrointestinal disorder major disorder History severe allergy/hypersensitivity symptoms/signs ongoing allergy/hypersensitivity Intake prescribe medicine St John 's Wort , except occasional paracetamol nasal anticongestant , within 3 week use overthecounter drug within 2 week first administration study drug
